alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 6:42AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Santa Barbara County through 715 AM PST... At 641 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Point Conception, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Conception. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast
